DOC.brief_summary: Background : Insomnia highly prevalent disable disorder Cognitive Behavior Therapy Insomnia ( CBT-I ) establish best available treatment . Still , negligible number patient insomnia receive treatment . One potential way improve dissemination CBT-I use online adaptation CBT-I . This new method deliver CBT-I known effective online treatment compare face-to-face CBT-I . This trial 's purpose compare face-to-face CBT-I online CBT-I . Because great advantage online treatment availability cost , trial design noninferiority trial . Aim : To test online CBT-I noninferior reduce insomnia complaint compare CBT-I deliver face-to-face therapist .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavior Therapy Insomnia Delivered Therapist Internet
DOC.criteria: meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSM ) 5 diagnostic criterion insomnia disorder condition render patient incapable understanding treatment ( e.g . actively psychotic , mental retardation , dementia others ongoing substance abuse problem organic sleep disturbance circadian sleep disturbance ongoing medical condition treatment insomnia indicate ( e.g . attack phase multiple sclerosis ) work night shift unable discontinue work pattern sufficiently fluent Norwegian understand assessment treatment necessary computer skill need log web base program
